name: Build a home

projects.title: Project One
projects.description: This is what a home would look like

projects.title: Project Five
projects.description: Harmonising with culture, spaces and resources

services.title: Why this campaign
services.description: I am raising funds for a first home in Lisbon — a stable base to teach, create, and grow.

services.title: Use of funds
services.description: Down payment and essential legal costs only. No lifestyle expenses, just the path to a modest, safe home.

services.title: Transparency & updates
services.description: Regular progress posts with photos and simple budget snapshots so you can see every step.

services.title: Ways to help
services.description: Donate if you can, or share the project with friends, communities, or potential partners.

aboutpara:
Hello! I'm Patricia, an English teacher and creative based in Lisbon.

After years of moving between temporary homes, I dream of a place to call my own.

Lisbon's housing prices have made that dream hard to reach.

This campaign helps fund a down payment and essential legal costs.

Every euro goes directly toward a stable, peaceful home.

From there, I can teach, create, and share work with more heart.

I'll post transparent updates: progress, photos, and milestones.

If you can't donate, sharing the campaign already helps a lot.

Thank you for walking this path with me.

impact.description:
Passionate about technology, education, and urban renewal, I am building projects that connect creativity, language, and community.

My work focuses on creating meaningful impact — from helping people communicate confidently in English to reimagining forgotten spaces in cities like Lisbon and Las Palmas.
